article_title: Hospital employment on the rise among primary care physicians
article_text:

article_metadata.description: Hospital employment among doctors is becoming more popular. The number of hospital-employed primary care physicians increased from 10 to 20 percent from 2012 to 2014, while those who owned single-specialty private care dipped from 12 to 7 percent, according to a new survey from Jackson Healthcare.
